participant_1.background:
I'm going to try to talk to my spouse about spending more time together this weekend, even though I know it's a long shot.
my beer gut is so huge i have not seen my feet in two years.
I started a small business so I could spend more time with my family.
I get my creative energy from listening to music and trying to create my own.
i have been working the same job for two years.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy working on cars and spending time with my pets, they are both important hobbies to me.
I'm grateful for my pets and I'm getting used to my new home.
My goal is to be a great teacher and inspire my students to be the best they can be.
i own a dog who is my best friend.
i really love plants.

content.text: Hi there! What's your name?
Hello! My name is [participant_2]. What's yours?
It's nice to meet you [participant_1]. My name is [participant_1].
Nice to meet you too! What do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher. What about you?
I'm a mechanic.
Oh, that's cool. I love cars. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog named Buddy. He's my best friend.
Aww, that's so sweet. I love dogs too. I have a cat named Mittens.
Oh, I love cats too!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love working on cars, spending time with my pets, and gardening.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like working on cars too. And I love plants.
What kind of plants do you like?
I like succulents and cacti. They're so easy to take care of.
Oh, those are cool. I like flowers.
Flowers are beautiful.
They sure are. I like to grow flowers in my garden.
That's so cool. I wish I could grow flowers.
You can! It's not too hard.
Maybe I'll try it someday.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the advice. I might just do that.
